answers.answer: yes sweetheart u can b pregnant. check a doctor n make sure. tests arren't always conclusive n u need to b sure so u can take better care of urself. it only takes one drop of semien to get u pregnant, maybe he came out a sec too late. get a check up n put ur mind at ezz.

So basically your period is 3 weeks late,  and you took a pregnancy test last week?If you did the test according to the directions,  it's unlikely that you're pregnant,  although as rehma says, it's possible.You have two things that could have caused your menstrual period to stop - a really great amount of weight gain in a very short period of time,   and working out at the gym.  Either of those things can cause your periods to stop.Gaining 17 pounds in the first 6 weeks isn't a sign of pregnancy - it's a symptom of extreme over eating or some other condition,  like diabetes.The fact that you have had that large weight gain so quickly - AND you've begun to workout often - it's likely that those things have caused your delayed period.

question: Hello! My name is Stephanie and i dont kno if im pregant! My last period was on feb 24th  i started gym at this time and ..It did not come in March either...i did not vomit but i started to gain weight.Im 17 pounds heavier. I've started to eat but because im under stress....and in April...gym was now regular...i took a pregancy test almost at 6 weeks after my period on Feb. and it was negative.  I did not use a condom but my partner did not break inside me..he always jock it out after. Could i be pregant? Is it to early to tell if I am?
title: Can I be pregant?
